##  United States's Covid-19 Cases vs Test


```{r}
rm(list=ls())
db <- db <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(),dbname= "../COVID-19-DB/OURWORLD.sqlite3")
df <- dbGetQuery(db,"select * from OWID where location ='United States'")
df$date <- as.Date(df$date)
df <- df[order(df$date),]
SWE <- df %>% select(date,new_cases,new_tests) %>% filter(date >="2020-07-10")
```

### Summary States

```{r}
SWE %>% dlookr::diagnose_numeric() %>% flextable::flextable()
```

### Plot  Cases and Test and Ratios (Cases/Tests)

```{r}
SWE %>% ggplot(aes(x=date,y=new_cases)) + geom_col() +
  labs(title = "United States Daily Covid-19 Cases") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma)
  
SWE %>% ggplot(aes(x=date,y=new_tests)) + geom_col() +
  labs(title = "United States Daily Covid-19 Test") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma)
```
```{r}

SWE %>% mutate(Ratio = new_cases/new_tests) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=date,y=Ratio)) + geom_col() +
  labs(title = "United States Covid-19 Ratio of Cases to Test ") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels  = percent)
```

### Plot of 7 Day Moving Average vs Test

```{r}
SWE$movavg <- ma(SWE$new_cases,28,centre = TRUE) 
SWE$Calc  <- SWE$movavg/SWE$new_test
ggplot(SWE) + geom_line(aes(x=date,y=Calc),lwd=1,col="red") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels  = percent) +
  labs(title="United States Ratio of Cases (28 day mov avg) to Test",
       y = "Ratio of Cases to Tests")
```
